ORG.oclc.oai.server.crosswalk

Class Crosswalk

  • java.lang.Object
    • ORG.oclc.oai.server.crosswalk.Crosswalk
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedJDBC2oai_dc, FileMap2oai_dc, FileMap2oai_etdms, JDBC2oai_dc, NodePassThruCrosswalk, XML2oai_dc, XML2oai_etdms, XSLTCrosswalk

    public abstract class Crosswalk
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts a native "item" to an OAI metadataFormat.

      • isAvailableFor

        public abstract boolean isAvailableFor(java.lang.Object nativeItem)
        Can this nativeItem be represented in ETDMS format?
        Parameters:
        nativeItem - a record in native format
        Returns:
        true if ETDMS format is possible, false otherwise.

      • createMetadata

        public abstract java.lang.String createMetadata(java.lang.Object nativeItem)
                                         throws CannotDisseminateFormatException
        Perform the actual crosswalk.
        Parameters:
        nativeItem - the native "item". In this case, it is already formatted as an OAI element, with the possible exception that multiple metadataFormats are present in the element.
        Returns:
        a String containing the XML to be stored within the element.
        Throws:
        CannotDisseminateFormatException - nativeItem doesn't support this format.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        returns the schemaLocation for this crosswalk.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String containing the schemaLocation.
